description: Calculated - Total score based on an 8-item questionnaires ranking likelihood of dozing off Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888). Scale 0-3 for individual items; 0 to 24 for overall score.
calculation: ess_total = ess_1sitread + ess_2watchingtv + ess_3sitinactive + ess_4passenger + ess_5lyingdown + ess_6sittalk + ess_7afterlunch + ess_8stoppedcar
